00219 void MainWindow::FinishManipulation( )
00220 {
00221         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00222         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex)->GetNode() );
00223 
00224         SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
00225 
00226         QUndoCommand* command = new QUndoCommand();
00227 
00228         QString translationValue = QString( "%1 %2 %3" ).arg( QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[0] ),
00229                                                                                                                 QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[1] ),
00230                                                                                                                 QString::number( nodeTransform->translation.getValue()[2] ) );
00231         new CmdModifyParameter( nodeTransform, QString( "translation" ), translationValue, m_sceneModel, command );
00232         m_commandStack->push( command );
00233 
00234         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00235         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00236 
00237 }

00242 void MainWindow::StartManipulation( SoDragger* dragger )
00243 {
00244         SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00245         coinSearch->setNode( dragger );
00246         coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST);
00247 
00248         coinSearch->apply( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode() );
00249 
00250         SoPath* coinScenePath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00251         if( !coinScenePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null coinScenePath." );
00252 
00253         SoNodeKitPath* nodePath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinScenePath );
00254         if( !nodePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null nodePath." );
00255 
00256 
00257         nodePath->truncate(nodePath->getLength()-1 );
00258         SoBaseKit* coinNode =  static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( nodePath->getTail() );
00259 
00260         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromPath( *nodePath );
00261         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00262 
00263         SoNode* manipulator = coinNode->getPart( "transform", true );
00264         m_manipulators_Buffer = new QStringList();
00265 
00266         SoFieldList fieldList;
00267     int totalFields = manipulator->getFields( fieldList );
00268 
00269     SoField* pField = 0;
00270     SbName fieldName;
00271     SbString fieldValue = "null";
00272 
00273 
00274         for( int index = 0; index < totalFields; ++index )
00275         {
00276                 pField = fieldList.get( index );
00277                 if( pField )
00278                 {
00279 
00280                 pField->get( fieldValue );
00281                         m_manipulators_Buffer->push_back(QString( fieldValue.getString() ) );
00282                 }
00283         }
00284         delete coinSearch;
00285 }

00304 void MainWindow::DefineSunLight()
00305 {
00306         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00307         if( !coinScene ) return;
00308 
00309         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
00310         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = sceneInstance->children[ sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
00311         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00312 
00313         TLightKit* currentLight = 0;
00314         if( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )       currentLight = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00315 
00316         QVector< TShapeFactory* > shapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetShapeFactories();
00317 
00318         QVector< TShapeFactory* > tFlatShapeFactoryList;
00319         for( int i = 0; i < shapeFactoryList.size(); ++i  )
00320                 if( shapeFactoryList[i]->IsFlat() )     tFlatShapeFactoryList<<shapeFactoryList[i];
00321 
00322         QVector< TSunShapeFactory* > tSunShapeFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetSunShapeFactories();
00323 
00324         LightDialog dialog( currentLight, tSunShapeFactoryList );
00325         if( dialog.exec() )
00326         {
00327 
00328                 TLightKit* lightKit = dialog.GetTLightKit();
00329                 if( !lightKit ) return;
00330 
00331                 lightKit->setName( "Light" );
00332 
00333                 CmdLightKitModified* command = new CmdLightKitModified( lightKit, coinScene, *m_sceneModel );
00334                 m_commandStack->push( command );
00335 
00336                 //UpdateLightDimensions();
00337                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00338 
00339                 parametersView->UpdateView();
00340                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00341 
00342                 actionCalculateSunPosition->setEnabled( true );
00343 
00344         }
00345 }

00362 void MainWindow::ExportPhotonMap()
00363 {
00364         if ( m_photonMap == NULL )
00365         {
00366                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh", "No Photon Map stored", 1 );
00367             return;
00368         }
00369 
00370         ExportDialog exportDialog( *m_sceneModel, m_lastExportSurfaceUrl, m_lastExportInGlobal, m_lastExportFileName, this );
00371         if( !exportDialog.exec() ) return;
00372 
00373         QString fileName = exportDialog.GetExportFileName();
00374         if( fileName.isEmpty() )
00375         {
00376                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh", "No file defined to save Photon Map", 1 );
00377                 return;
00378         }
00379         m_lastExportFileName = fileName;
00380         m_lastExportInGlobal = exportDialog.ExportPhotonsInGlobal();
00381 
00382         //Compute photon power
00383         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00384         if( !coinScene ) return;
00385         if( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) ) return;
00386         TLightKit*lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00387 
00388 
00389         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return;
00390         TSunShape* sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
00391         double irradiance = sunShape->GetIrradiance();
00392 
00393         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return;
00394         TLightShape* raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
00395         double inputAperture = raycastingShape->GetArea();
00396 
00397         double wPhoton = ( inputAperture * irradiance ) / m_tracedRays;
00398 
00399         int okExport;
00400         if( exportDialog.ExportAllPhotonMap() )
00401                 okExport = trf::ExportAll( m_lastExportFileName, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00402         else
00403         {
00404                 QString nodeURL = exportDialog.GetSelectedSurface();
00405                 if( !nodeURL.isEmpty() )        m_lastExportSurfaceUrl = nodeURL;
00406 
00407                 QModelIndex selectedNodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeURL );
00408                 InstanceNode* selectedSurface = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( selectedNodeIndex );
00409                 if( !selectedSurface )
00410                 {
00411                         QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh", "Selected node in not a valid export node." );
00412                         return;
00413                 }
00414 
00415                 if( m_lastExportInGlobal )
00416                         okExport = trf::ExportSurfaceGlobalCoordinates( m_lastExportFileName, selectedSurface, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00417                 else
00418                         okExport = trf::ExportSurfaceLocalCoordinates( m_lastExportFileName, selectedSurface, wPhoton, m_photonMap );
00419         }
00420         if( !okExport )
00421         {
00422                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Tonatiuh", "An unexpected error has occurred exporting photon map to a file." );
00423                 return;
00424         }
00425 
00426 }

00431 void MainWindow::Open()
00432 {
00433     if ( OkToContinue() )
00434     {
00435         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
00436         QString openDirectory = settings.value( "openDirectory", QString( "." ) ).toString();
00437 
00438         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
00439                                tr( "Open" ), openDirectory,
00440                                tr( "Tonatiuh files (*.tnh)" ) );
00441 
00442         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return;
00443 
00444         QFileInfo file( fileName );
00445         settings.setValue( "openDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
00446         StartOver( fileName );
00447     }
00448 }

00512 void MainWindow::ShowMenu( const QModelIndex& index)
00513 {
00514         if( !index.isValid() ) return;
00515         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( index, QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
00516 
00517         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(index)->GetNode();
00518         SoType type = coinNode->getTypeId();
00519 
00520         QMenu popupmenu(this);
00521 
00522         popupmenu.addAction( actionCut );
00523         popupmenu.addAction( actionCopy );
00524         popupmenu.addAction( actionPasteCopy );
00525         popupmenu.addAction( actionPasteLink );
00526         popupmenu.addAction( actionDelete );
00527 
00528         QMenu transformMenu( "Convert to", &popupmenu );
00529 
00530         if( type.isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00531         {
00532                 popupmenu.addAction( transformMenu.menuAction() );
00533                 transformMenu.addAction( tr("SoCenterballManip"),  this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoCenterballManip()));
00534                 transformMenu.addAction( tr("SoHandleBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoHandleBoxManip()));
00535                 transformMenu.addAction( tr("SoJackManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoJackManip()));
00536                 transformMenu.addAction( tr("SoTabBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTabBoxManip()));
00537                 transformMenu.addAction( tr("SoTrackballManip"),  this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTrackballManip()));
00538                 transformMenu.addAction( tr("SoTransformBoxManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTransformBoxManip()));
00539                 transformMenu.addAction( tr("SoTransformerManip"), this, SLOT(SoTransform_to_SoTransformerManip()));
00540 
00541                 TSeparatorKit* coinKit = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( coinNode );
00542                 SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinKit->getPart("transform", true) );
00543                 SoType transformType = transform->getTypeId();
00544 
00545         //Manipuladores
00546                 if ( transformType.isDerivedFrom(SoTransformManip::getClassTypeId()) )  transformMenu.addAction( tr("SoTransform"), this, SLOT(SoManip_to_SoTransform()) );
00547 
00548         }
00549 
00550         //Mostramos el menu contextual
00551         popupmenu.exec( QCursor::pos() );
00552 
00553 }

00558 void MainWindow::ShowRayTracerOptionsDialog()
00559 {
00560         double oldSelectedRandomDeviate = m_selectedRandomDeviate;
00561         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomDeviateFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
00562         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
00563 
00564         RayTraceDialog* options = new RayTraceDialog( m_raysPerIteration, randomDeviateFactoryList, m_fraction, m_drawPhotons, photonmapFactoryList, m_selectedRandomDeviate, m_selectedPhotonMap, m_increasePhotonMap, this );
00565         options->exec();
00566 
00567         SetRaysPerIteration( options->GetNumRays() );
00568         m_selectedRandomDeviate = options->GetRandomDeviateFactoryIndex();
00569         if( oldSelectedRandomDeviate != m_selectedRandomDeviate )
00570         {
00571                 delete m_rand;
00572                 m_rand = 0;
00573         }
00574 
00575         m_fraction = options->GetRaysFactionToDraw();
00576         m_drawPhotons = options->DrawPhotons();
00577 
00578         m_selectedPhotonMap =options->GetPhotonMapFactoryIndex();
00579         m_increasePhotonMap = options->IncreasePhotonMap();
00580 
00581 }

00606 void MainWindow::on_actionEdit_Mode_toggled()
00607 {
00608         if ( !actionEdit_Mode->isChecked() )
00609         {
00610                 m_graphicView[1]->hide();
00611                 m_graphicView[2]->hide();
00612                 m_graphicView[3]->hide();
00613                 m_focusView = 0;
00614         }
00615         else
00616         {
00617                 m_graphicView[1]->show();
00618                 m_graphicView[2]->show();
00619                 m_graphicView[3]->show();
00620         }
00621 }

00623 void MainWindow::on_actionSunPlane_triggered()
00624 {
00625 
00626         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
00627         if ( !coinScene )  return;
00628 
00629         //Check if there is a light and is properly configured
00630         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return;
00631         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", true ) );
00632         if ( !lightKit ) return;
00633 
00634 
00635         SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00636         coinSearch->setNode( lightKit );
00637         coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST );
00638         coinSearch->apply( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode() );
00639 
00640         SoPath* lightPath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00641         if( !lightPath ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow Null light path." );
00642 
00643         const SbViewportRegion vpr = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00644         SoGetMatrixAction * getmatrixaction = new SoGetMatrixAction(vpr);
00645         getmatrixaction->apply( lightPath );
00646 
00647         Transform  lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromMatrix( getmatrixaction->getMatrix() );
00648 
00649         Point3D camPosition = lightToWorld( Point3D( 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 ) );
00650         Vector3D camOrientation= lightToWorld( Vector3D( 0.0, -1.0, 0.0 ) );
00651 
00652         double t = 1.0;
00653         if( camPosition.y != 0.0 && camOrientation.y != 0.0 ) t = -camPosition.y / camOrientation.y;
00654         Point3D targetPoint = camPosition + camOrientation * t;
00655 
00656 
00657         SoCamera* cam = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetCamera();
00658         cam->position.setValue( SbVec3f( camPosition.x, camPosition.y, camPosition.z ) );
00659         cam->pointAt( SbVec3f( targetPoint.x, targetPoint.y, targetPoint.z ) );
00660         cam->viewAll( m_graphicsRoot->GetNode(), vpr );
00661 }
00662

00721 void MainWindow::ChangeGridSettings()
00722 {
00723         GridSettingsDialog gridDialog( m_gridXElements, m_gridZElements, m_gridXSpacing, m_gridZSpacing );
00724         if( gridDialog.exec() )
00725         {
00726                 m_graphicsRoot->RemoveGrid();
00727 
00728                 m_gridXElements = gridDialog.GetXDimension();
00729                 m_gridZElements = gridDialog.GetZDimension();
00730 
00731                 if( gridDialog.IsSizeDefined() )
00732                 {
00733                         m_gridXSpacing = gridDialog.GetXSpacing();
00734                         m_gridZSpacing = gridDialog.GetZSpacing();
00735                 }
00736                 else
00737                 {
00738 
00739                         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
00740                         if ( !sceneInstance )  return;
00741                         SoNode* rootNode = sceneInstance->GetNode();
00742                         SoPath* nodePath = new SoPath( rootNode );
00743                         nodePath->ref();
00744 
00745                         SbViewportRegion region = m_graphicView[m_focusView]->GetViewportRegion();
00746                         SoGetBoundingBoxAction* bbAction = new SoGetBoundingBoxAction( region ) ;
00747                         if(nodePath)    bbAction->apply(nodePath);
00748 
00749                         SbXfBox3f box= bbAction->getXfBoundingBox();
00750                         delete bbAction;
00751                         nodePath->unref();
00752 
00753                         m_gridXSpacing = 10;
00754                         m_gridZSpacing = 10;
00755 
00756                         if( !box.isEmpty() )
00757                         {
00758                                 SbVec3f min, max;
00759                                 box.getBounds(min, max);
00760 
00761                                 m_gridXSpacing = ( 2 *  std::max( fabs( max[0] ), fabs( min[0] ) ) + 5  ) / m_gridXElements;
00762                                 m_gridZSpacing = ( 2 *  std::max( fabs( max[2] ), fabs( min[2] ) ) + 5 ) / m_gridZElements;
00763 
00764                         }
00765 
00766                 }
00767                 m_graphicsRoot->AddGrid( CreateGrid( m_gridXElements, m_gridZElements, m_gridXSpacing, m_gridZSpacing ) );
00768                 m_graphicsRoot->ShowGrid( true );
00769         }
00770 
00771 }

00776 void MainWindow::ChangeNodeName( const QModelIndex& index, const QString& newName)
00777 {
00778         if( !index.isValid() )  return;
00779 
00780         InstanceNode* nodeInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
00781         if( !nodeInstance ) return;
00782         if( ! nodeInstance->GetNode() ) return;
00783 
00784         CmdChangeNodeName* command = new CmdChangeNodeName( index, newName, m_sceneModel );
00785         QString commandText = QString( "Node name changed to: %1").arg( newName );
00786         command->setText(commandText);
00787         m_commandStack->push( command );
00788 
00789         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00790 
00791 }

00834 void MainWindow::CreateGroupNode()
00835 {
00836         QModelIndex parentIndex;
00837         if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex()))
00838                 parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
00839         else
00840                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00841 
00842         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00843         if( !parentInstance ) return;
00844 
00845         SoNode* coinNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
00846         if( !coinNode ) return;
00847 
00848 
00849         if ( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00850         {
00851                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
00852 
00853                 CmdInsertSeparatorKit* cmdInsertSeparatorKit = new CmdInsertSeparatorKit( separatorKit, QPersistentModelIndex(parentIndex), m_sceneModel );
00854                 cmdInsertSeparatorKit->setText( "Insert SeparatorKit node" );
00855                 m_commandStack->push( cmdInsertSeparatorKit );
00856 
00857                 int count = 1;
00858                 QString nodeName = QString( "TSeparatorKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00859                 while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( separatorKit, nodeName ) )
00860                 {
00861                         count++;
00862                         nodeName = QString( "TSeparatorKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00863                 }
00864                 
00865                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00866                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00867 
00868         }
00869 }

00876 void MainWindow::CreateMaterial( QString materialType )
00877 {
00878         QVector< TMaterialFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetMaterialFactories();
00879         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return;
00880 
00881         QVector< QString > materialNames;
00882         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
00883                 materialNames<< factoryList[i]->TMaterialName();
00884 
00885         int selectedMaterial = materialNames.indexOf( materialType );
00886         if( selectedMaterial < 0 )      return;
00887 
00888         CreateMaterial( factoryList[ selectedMaterial ] );
00889 }

00916 void MainWindow::CreateSurfaceNode()
00917 {
00918         QModelIndex parentIndex;
00919         if (( ! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex()))
00920                 parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0, sceneModelView->rootIndex());
00921         else
00922                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
00923 
00924         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00925         if( !parentInstance ) return;
00926 
00927                 SoNode* selectedCoinNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
00928         if( !selectedCoinNode ) return;
00929 
00930         if ( selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00931         {
00932                 TShapeKit* shapeKit = new TShapeKit;
00933 
00934                 CmdInsertShapeKit* insertShapeKit = new CmdInsertShapeKit( parentIndex, shapeKit, m_sceneModel );
00935                 m_commandStack->push( insertShapeKit );
00936 
00937                 int count = 1;
00938                 QString nodeName = QString( "TShapeKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00939                 while ( !m_sceneModel->SetNodeName( shapeKit, nodeName ) )
00940                 {
00941                         count++;
00942                         nodeName = QString( "TShapeKit%1").arg( QString::number( count) );
00943                 }
00944                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
00945                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
00946         }
00947 }

01037 void MainWindow::InsertFileComponent( QString componentFileName )
01038 {
01039         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01040         if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) )
01041                         parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01042         else
01043                 parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01044 
01045         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode();
01046         if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01047 
01048         if ( componentFileName.isEmpty() ) return;
01049 
01050         SoInput componentInput;
01051         if ( !componentInput.openFile( componentFileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
01052         {
01053                 QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
01054                                 tr( "Cannot open file:\n%1." ).arg( componentFileName ) );
01055                 return;
01056         }
01057 
01058         SoSeparator* componentSeparator = SoDB::readAll( &componentInput );
01059         componentInput.closeFile();
01060 
01061         if ( !componentSeparator )
01062         {
01063                 QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Scene Graph Structure" ),
01064                                 tr( "Error reading file: \n%1." )
01065                                 .arg( componentFileName ) );
01066                 return;
01067         }
01068 
01069         TSeparatorKit* componentRoot = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( componentSeparator->getChild(0) );
01070         CmdInsertSeparatorKit* cmdInsertSeparatorKit = new CmdInsertSeparatorKit( componentRoot, QPersistentModelIndex(parentIndex), m_sceneModel );
01071         cmdInsertSeparatorKit->setText( "Insert SeparatorKit node" );
01072         m_commandStack->push( cmdInsertSeparatorKit );
01073 
01074         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01075         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01076 
01077 }
01078 
01084 void MainWindow::InsertUserDefinedComponent()
01085 {
01086         QModelIndex parentIndex;
01087          if (( !sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || ( sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) )
01088                  parentIndex = m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex());
01089          else
01090                  parentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01091 
01092         SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex )->GetNode();
01093 
01094         if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01095 
01096         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( this,
01097                                                        tr( "Open Tonatiuh document" ), ".",
01098                                                        tr( "Tonatiuh component (*.tcmp)" ) );
01099 
01100         if ( fileName.isEmpty() ) return;
01101 
01102         InsertFileComponent( fileName );
01103 }

01160 
01164 void MainWindow::Run()
01165 {
01166         QDateTime startTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01167 
01168     // Initialize variables
01169         InstanceNode* rootSeparatorInstance = 0;
01170         InstanceNode* lightInstance = 0;
01171         SoTransform* lightTransform = 0;
01172         TSunShape* sunShape = 0;
01173         TLightShape* raycastingSurface = 0;
01174 
01175         if( ReadyForRaytracing( rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, lightTransform, sunShape, raycastingSurface ) )
01176         {
01177                 QVector< QPair< TShapeKit*, Transform > > surfacesList;
01178 
01179 
01180                 //Compute bounding boxes and world to object transforms
01181                 trf::ComputeSceneTreeMap( rootSeparatorInstance, Transform( new Matrix4x4 ), &surfacesList );
01182 
01183                 TLightKit* light = static_cast< TLightKit* > ( lightInstance->GetNode() );
01184                 light->ComputeLightSourceArea( surfacesList );
01185 
01186                 QVector< double > raysPerThread;
01187                 const int maximumValueProgressScale = 100;
01188                 unsigned long  t1 = m_raysPerIteration / maximumValueProgressScale;
01189                 for( int progressCount = 0; progressCount < maximumValueProgressScale; ++ progressCount )
01190                         raysPerThread<< t1;
01191 
01192                 if( ( t1 * maximumValueProgressScale ) < m_raysPerIteration )   raysPerThread<< ( m_raysPerIteration-( t1* maximumValueProgressScale) );
01193 
01194                 Transform lightToWorld = tgf::TransformFromSoTransform( lightTransform );
01195 
01196                 // Create a progress dialog.
01197                 QProgressDialog dialog;
01198                 dialog.setLabelText(QString("Progressing using %1 thread(s)...").arg(QThread::idealThreadCount()));
01199 
01200                 //ParallelRandomDeviate* m_pParallelRand = new ParallelRandomDeviate( *m_rand,140000 );
01201                 // Create a QFutureWatcher and conncect signals and slots.
01202                 QFutureWatcher< TPhotonMap* > futureWatcher;
01203                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(finished()), &dialog, SLOT(reset()));
01204                 QObject::connect(&dialog, SIGNAL(canceled()), &futureWatcher, SLOT(cancel()));
01205                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(progressRangeChanged(int, int)), &dialog, SLOT(setRange(int, int)));
01206                 QObject::connect(&futureWatcher, SIGNAL(progressValueChanged(int)), &dialog, SLOT(setValue(int)));
01207 
01208                 QMutex mutex;
01209                 QFuture< TPhotonMap* > photonMap = QtConcurrent::mappedReduced( raysPerThread, RayTracer(  rootSeparatorInstance, lightInstance, raycastingSurface, sunShape, lightToWorld, *m_rand, &mutex, m_photonMap ), trf::CreatePhotonMap, QtConcurrent::UnorderedReduce );
01210                 futureWatcher.setFuture( photonMap );
01211 
01212                 // Display the dialog and start the event loop.
01213                 dialog.exec();
01214                 futureWatcher.waitForFinished();
01215 
01216 
01217                 QDateTime time2 = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01218                 std::cout <<"time2: "<< startTime.secsTo( time2 ) << std::endl;
01219 
01220                 m_tracedRays += m_raysPerIteration;
01221                 ShowRaysIn3DView();
01222 
01223         }
01224 
01225         QDateTime endTime = QDateTime::currentDateTime();
01226         std::cout <<"Elapsed time: "<< startTime.secsTo( endTime ) << std::endl;
01227 }
01228 
01236 bool MainWindow::Save()
01237 {
01238         if ( m_currentFile.isEmpty() ) return SaveAs();
01239         else return SaveFile( m_currentFile );
01240 }
01241 
01247 bool MainWindow::SaveAs()
01248 {
01249 
01250         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
01251 
01252         QString saveDirectory = settings.value( "saveDirectory", QString( "." ) ).toString();
01253 
01254         QString tonatiuhFilter( "Tonatiuh files (*.tnh)" );
01255         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
01256                                tr( "Save" ), saveDirectory,
01257                                tonatiuhFilter, &tonatiuhFilter );
01258         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
01259 
01260         QFileInfo file( fileName );
01261         settings.setValue( "saveDirectory", file.absolutePath() );
01262 
01263         if( file.completeSuffix().compare( "tnh" ) )
01264                 fileName.append( ".tnh" );
01265         return SaveFile( fileName );
01266 }

01277 
01282 bool MainWindow::SaveComponent()
01283 {
01284     if( !m_selectionModel->hasSelection() ) return false;
01285     if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
01286 
01287     QModelIndex componentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01288 
01289     SoNode* coinNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( componentIndex )->GetNode();
01290 
01291     if ( !coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01292     {
01293         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
01294                                   tr( "Selected node in not valid  for component node" ) );
01295         return false;
01296     }
01297 
01298     TSeparatorKit* componentRoot = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* > ( coinNode );
01299     if( !componentRoot ) return false;
01300 
01301 
01302         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
01303                                tr( "Save Tonatiuh component" ), ".",
01304                                tr( "Tonatiuh component (*.tcmp)" ) );
01305         if( fileName.isEmpty() ) return false;
01306 
01307         QFileInfo componentFile( fileName );
01308         if( componentFile.completeSuffix().compare( "tcmp" ) )
01309                 fileName.append( ".tcmp" );
01310 
01311     SoWriteAction SceneOuput;
01312     if ( !SceneOuput.getOutput()->openFile( fileName.toLatin1().constData() ) )
01313         {
01314         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
01315                               tr( "Cannot open file %1. " )
01316                             .arg( fileName ));
01317                 return false;
01318         }
01319 
01320     QApplication::setOverrideCursor( Qt::WaitCursor );
01321         SceneOuput.getOutput()->setBinary( false );
01322         SceneOuput.apply( componentRoot );
01323         SceneOuput.getOutput()->closeFile();
01324         QApplication::restoreOverrideCursor();
01325         return true;
01326 }

01334         if( m_selectionModel->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return;
01335

01337 }

01342 int MainWindow::SetPhotonMapType( QString typeName )
01343 {
01344         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > factoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
01345         if( factoryList.size() == 0 )   return 0;
01346 
01347         QVector< QString > photonMapNames;
01348         for( int i = 0; i < factoryList.size(); i++ )
01349                 photonMapNames<< factoryList[i]->TPhotonMapName();
01350 
01351         m_selectedPhotonMap = photonMapNames.indexOf( typeName );
01352         if( m_selectedPhotonMap < 0 )   return 0;
01353 
01354         return 1;
01355 }

01364 
01368 void MainWindow::SetValue( QString nodeUrl, QString parameter, QString value )
01369 {
01370         if( nodeUrl.isEmpty() || parameter.isEmpty() || value.isEmpty() )
01371         {
01372                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01373             "You must define a node url, a parameter name and a value.", 1 );
01374                 return;
01375         }
01376 
01377         QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( nodeUrl );
01378         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() )
01379         {
01380                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01381             "Defined node url is not a valid url.", 1 );
01382                 return;
01383         }
01384 
01385         InstanceNode* nodeInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex );
01386         if( !nodeInstance )     return;
01387 
01388         SoNode* node = nodeInstance->GetNode();
01389         if( !node )     return;
01390         if ( node->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01391         {
01392                 TSeparatorKit* separatorNode = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( node );
01393                 SoTransform* nodeTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( separatorNode->getPart( "transform", true ) );
01394                 node = nodeTransform;
01395         }
01396 
01397 
01398         SoField* parameterField = node->getField( parameter.toStdString().c_str() );
01399         if( !parameterField )
01400         {
01401                 QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh",
01402             QString( "Defined node has not contains the parameter %1." ).arg( parameter), 1 );
01403                 return;
01404         }
01405         SetParameterValue( node, parameter, value );
01406 }
01407

01409 //Manipulators actions
01410 void MainWindow::SoTransform_to_SoCenterballManip()
01411 {
01412         //Transform to a SoCenterballManip manipulator
01413         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01414 
01415         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex);
01416         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceNode->GetNode() );
01417         SoTransform* transform = static_cast< SoTransform* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", false ) );
01418 
01419         SoCenterballManip * manipulator = new SoCenterballManip;
01420         manipulator->rotation.setValue(transform->rotation.getValue());
01421         manipulator->translation.setValue(transform->translation.getValue());
01422         manipulator->scaleFactor.setValue(transform->scaleFactor.getValue());
01423         manipulator->scaleOrientation.setValue(transform->scaleOrientation.getValue());
01424         manipulator->center.setValue(transform->center.getValue());
01425 
01426         coinNode->setPart("transform", manipulator);
01427         ChangeSelection( currentIndex );
01428 
01429         SoDragger* dragger = manipulator->getDragger();
01430         dragger->addStartCallback (startManipulator, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
01431         dragger->addFinishCallback(finishManipulator, static_cast< void*>( this ) );
01432 
01433         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01434 }

01595 void MainWindow::SoManip_to_SoTransform()
01596 {
01597         //Transform manipulator to a SoTransform
01598         QModelIndex currentIndex = sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01599 
01600         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex(currentIndex);
01601         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceNode->GetNode() );
01602         SoTransformManip* manipulator = static_cast< SoTransformManip* >( coinNode->getPart( "transform", false ) );
01603         if( !manipulator ) return;
01604 
01605         SoTransform* transform = new SoTransform;
01606         transform->rotation.setValue(manipulator->rotation.getValue());
01607         transform->translation.setValue(manipulator->translation.getValue());
01608         transform->scaleFactor.setValue(manipulator->scaleFactor.getValue());
01609         transform->scaleOrientation.setValue(manipulator->scaleOrientation.getValue());
01610         transform->center.setValue(manipulator->center.getValue());
01611 
01612         coinNode->setPart("transform", transform);
01613         ChangeSelection( currentIndex );
01614 
01615         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01616 }

01618 //for graphicview signals
01619 void MainWindow::selectionFinish( SoSelection* selection )
01620 {
01621     if(selection->getNumSelected() == 0 ) return;
01622 
01623     SoPath* selectionPath = selection->getPath( 0 );
01624     if ( !selectionPath ) return;
01625 
01626     if ( !selectionPath->containsNode ( m_document->GetSceneKit() ) ) return;
01627 
01628     SoNodeKitPath* nodeKitPath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* >( selectionPath );
01629     if(nodeKitPath->getTail()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(SoDragger::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01630 
01631     QModelIndex nodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromPath( *nodeKitPath );
01632         if ( !nodeIndex.isValid() ) return;
01633         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01634         m_selectionModel->select( nodeIndex , QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01635 
01636 }
01637 
01638 void MainWindow::ChangeSelection( const QModelIndex& current )
01639 {
01640         InstanceNode* instanceSelected = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( current );
01641     SoNode* selectedCoinNode = instanceSelected->GetNode();
01642 
01643     if (! selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
01644         {
01645                 SoBaseKit* parentNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( instanceSelected->GetParent()->GetNode() );
01646                 SbString partName = parentNode->getPartString( selectedCoinNode );
01647 
01648                 if( partName.getLength() == 0 ) partName = "material";
01649                 QStringList parts;
01650                 parts<<QString( partName.getString() );
01651 
01652                 parametersView->SelectionChanged( parentNode, parts );
01653 
01654         }
01655         else
01656         {
01657                 SoBaseKit* selectedCoinNodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( selectedCoinNode );
01658 
01659                 QStringList parts;
01660                 parametersView->SelectionChanged( selectedCoinNodeKit, parts );
01661         }
01662 }
01663 
01664 //for sunposdialog signals
01669 void MainWindow::ChangeSunPosition(  double azimuth, double zenith )
01670 {
01671         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01672         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", true ) );
01673         if ( !lightKit )
01674         {
01675                 QMessageBox::warning( this, "Toantiuh warning", tr( "Sun not defined in scene" ) );
01676         }
01677         else
01678         {
01679                 CmdLightPositionModified* command = new CmdLightPositionModified( lightKit, azimuth, zenith );
01680                 m_commandStack->push( command );
01681 
01682                 //UpdateLightDimensions();
01683                 m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01684                 m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01685         }
01686 }

01688 
01694 void MainWindow::CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory )
01695 {
01696         QModelIndex parentIndex = ( (! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) ) ?
01697                                                                 m_sceneModel->index( 0, 0, sceneModelView->rootIndex( )):
01698                                                                 sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01699 
01700         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01701         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01702         if( !parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01703 
01704         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
01705         TMaterial* material = static_cast< TMaterial* >( shapeKit->getPart( "material", false ) );
01706 
01707     if ( material )
01708     {
01709         QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
01710                                   "This TShapeKit already contains a material node", 1);
01711             return;
01712     }
01713 
01714         material = pTMaterialFactory->CreateTMaterial();
01715     QString typeName = pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName();
01716     material->setName( typeName.toStdString().c_str() );
01717 
01718     CmdInsertMaterial* createMaterial = new CmdInsertMaterial( shapeKit, material, m_sceneModel );
01719     QString commandText = QString( "Create Material: %1").arg( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName().toLatin1().constData() );
01720     createMaterial->setText(commandText);
01721     m_commandStack->push( createMaterial );
01722 
01723         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01724     m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01725 }
01726 
01736 void MainWindow::CreateShape( TShapeFactory* pTShapeFactory )
01737 {
01738     QModelIndex parentIndex = ((! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex())) ?
01739                                                                 m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex()) : sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01740 
01741         InstanceNode* parentInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
01742         SoNode* parentNode = parentInstance->GetNode();
01743         if( !parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01744 
01745         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
01746         TShape* shape = static_cast< TShape* >( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
01747 
01748     if (shape)
01749     {
01750         QMessageBox::information( this, "Tonatiuh Action",
01751                                   "This TShapeKit already contains a shape", 1);
01752     }
01753     else
01754     {
01755         shape = pTShapeFactory->CreateTShape();
01756         shape->setName( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName().toStdString().c_str() );
01757         CmdInsertShape* createShape = new CmdInsertShape( shapeKit, shape, m_sceneModel );
01758         QString commandText = QString( "Create Shape: %1" ).arg( pTShapeFactory->TShapeName().toLatin1().constData());
01759         createShape->setText( commandText );
01760         m_commandStack->push( createShape );
01761 
01762         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01763         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01764     }
01765 }
01766 
01767 
01768 void MainWindow::CreateTracker( TTrackerFactory* pTTrackerFactory )
01769 {
01770         QModelIndex parentIndex = ((! sceneModelView->currentIndex().isValid() ) || (sceneModelView->currentIndex() == sceneModelView->rootIndex())) ?
01771                                                                         m_sceneModel->index (0,0,sceneModelView->rootIndex()):
01772                                                                         sceneModelView->currentIndex();
01773 
01774         TSceneKit* scene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01775 
01776         TTracker* tracker = pTTrackerFactory->CreateTTracker( );
01777         tracker->SetSceneKit( scene );
01778 
01779         CmdInsertTracker* command = new CmdInsertTracker( tracker, parentIndex, scene, m_sceneModel );
01780         m_commandStack->push( command );
01781 
01782         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01783         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01784 }

01786 
01787 //for treeview signals
01788 void MainWindow::mousePressEvent( QMouseEvent * e )
01789 {
01790         QPoint pos = e->pos();
01791         int x = pos.x();
01792         int y = pos.y()-64;
01793 
01794         QSplitter *pSplitter = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicHorizontalSplitter" );
01795         QRect mainViewRect = pSplitter->geometry();
01796 
01797         if( mainViewRect.contains( x, y ) )
01798         {
01799                 QSplitter *pvSplitter1 = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" );
01800                 QSplitter *pvSplitter2 = findChild<QSplitter *>( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" );
01801                 QRect vViewRect1 = pvSplitter1->geometry();
01802                 if(vViewRect1.contains(x,y))
01803                 {
01804                         QList<int> size(pvSplitter2->sizes());
01805                         if(x < size[0])
01806                                 m_focusView = 0;
01807                         if(x > size[0])
01808                                 m_focusView = 1;
01809                 }
01810                 else
01811                 {
01812                         QList<int> size(pvSplitter1->sizes());
01813                         if(x < size[0])
01814                                 m_focusView = 2;
01815                         if(x > size[0])
01816                                 m_focusView = 3;
01817                 }
01818         }
01819 }
01820 
01821 
01822 void MainWindow::itemDragAndDrop( const QModelIndex& newParent,  const QModelIndex& node)
01823 {
01824         if( node == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return;
01825 
01826         InstanceNode* nodeInstnace = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( node );
01827         SoNode* coinNode = nodeInstnace->GetNode();
01828         //if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01829 
01830         QUndoCommand* dragAndDrop = new QUndoCommand();
01831         dragAndDrop->setText("Drag and Drop node");
01832         new CmdCut( node, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel, dragAndDrop );
01833 
01834         new CmdPaste( tgc::Shared, newParent, coinNode, *m_sceneModel, dragAndDrop );
01835         m_commandStack->push( dragAndDrop );
01836 
01837         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01838         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01839 
01840 }
01841 
01842 void MainWindow::itemDragAndDropCopy(const QModelIndex& newParent, const QModelIndex& node)
01843 {
01844         InstanceNode* nodeInstnace = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( node );
01845         SoNode* coinNode = nodeInstnace->GetNode();
01846         //if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) return;
01847 
01848         QUndoCommand* dragAndDropCopy = new QUndoCommand();
01849         dragAndDropCopy->setText("Drag and Drop Copy");
01850         new CmdCopy( node, m_coinNode_Buffer, m_sceneModel );
01851         new CmdPaste( tgc::Shared, newParent, coinNode, *m_sceneModel, dragAndDropCopy );
01852         m_commandStack->push( dragAndDropCopy );
01853 
01854         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
01855         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
01856 }
01857 
01858 void MainWindow::closeEvent( QCloseEvent* event )
01859 {
01860     if ( OkToContinue() )
01861     {
01862         WriteSettings();
01863         event->accept();
01864     }
01865     else event->ignore();
01866 }
01870 void MainWindow::ChangeModelScene()
01871 {
01872         TSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
01873 
01874         m_sceneModel->SetCoinScene( *coinScene );
01875     m_graphicsRoot->AddModel( coinScene );
01876 
01877         QModelIndex viewRootNodeIndex = m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( QString( "//SunNode" ) );
01878         InstanceNode* viewRootNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( viewRootNodeIndex );
01879         sceneModelView->setRootIndex( viewRootNodeIndex );
01880 
01881         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = viewRootNode->children[ 0 ];
01882 
01883         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
01884 
01885 }
01886 
01890 SoSeparator* MainWindow::CreateGrid( int xDimension, int zDimension, double xSpacing, double zSpacing )
01891 {
01892 
01893         double xWidth = xDimension * xSpacing;
01894         double zWidth = zDimension * zSpacing;
01895 
01896         int nVertex = xDimension * zDimension + 4;
01897     SbVec3f* vertex = new SbVec3f[nVertex];
01898 
01899     int nLines = xDimension + zDimension + 2;
01900     int* lines = new int[nLines];
01901 
01902 
01903     int vNum = 0;
01904     int lNum = 0;
01905     for( int xIndex = 0; xIndex <= xDimension; ++xIndex )
01906         {
01907                 double xValue = -( xWidth / 2  ) + xIndex * xSpacing;
01908                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xValue, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
01909                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xValue, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
01910                 lines[lNum++] = 2;
01911         }
01912 
01913         vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
01914         vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2, 0.0, zWidth/ 2 );
01915     lines[lNum++] = 2;
01916         vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
01917         vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2, 0.0, -zWidth/ 2 );
01918     lines[lNum++] = 2;
01919 
01920     for( int zIndex = 1; zIndex < zDimension; ++zIndex )
01921         {
01922                 double zValue = -( zWidth / 2  ) + zIndex * zSpacing;
01923                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( xWidth / 2 , 0.0, zValue );
01924                 vertex[vNum++].setValue( -xWidth / 2 , 0.0, zValue );
01925             lines[lNum++] = 2;
01926         }
01927 
01928 
01929         SoSeparator* grid = new SoSeparator;
01930 
01931         SoMaterial* mat = new SoMaterial;
01932         static float colors[2][3] = { {0.4f, 0.4f, 0.4f}, {0.6f, 0.6f, 0.6f} };
01933         mat->diffuseColor.setValues(0, 2, colors);
01934         grid->addChild(mat);
01935 
01936         SoCoordinate3* line_coords = new SoCoordinate3;
01937         line_coords->point.setValues(0, nVertex, vertex);
01938         grid->addChild(line_coords);
01939 
01940         SoLineSet* lineset=new SoLineSet;
01941         lineset->numVertices.setValues(0,lNum,lines);
01942         grid->addChild(lineset);
01943 
01944 
01945     delete[] vertex;
01946     delete[] lines;
01947         return grid;
01948 
01949 }
01950 
01954 QToolBar* MainWindow::CreateMaterialsTooBar( QMenu* pMaterialsMenu )
01955 {
01956         QToolBar* pMaterialsToolBar = new QToolBar( pMaterialsMenu );
01957         if (! pMaterialsToolBar ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::SetupToolBars: NULL pMaterialsToolBar" );
01958         pMaterialsToolBar->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8("materialsToolBar" ) );
01959         pMaterialsToolBar->setOrientation( Qt::Horizontal );
01960         pMaterialsToolBar->setWindowTitle( QLatin1String( "Materials" ) );
01961         addToolBar( pMaterialsToolBar );
01962         return pMaterialsToolBar;
01963 }
01964 
01968 QToolBar* MainWindow::CreateTrackerTooBar( QMenu* pTrackersMenu )
01969 {
01970         QToolBar* pTrackersToolBar = new QToolBar( pTrackersMenu );
01971         if (! pTrackersToolBar ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::SetupToolBars: NULL pTrackersToolBar" );
01972         pTrackersToolBar->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8("materialsToolBar" ) );
01973         pTrackersToolBar->setOrientation( Qt::Horizontal );
01974         pTrackersToolBar->setWindowTitle( QLatin1String( "Trackers" ) );
01975         addToolBar( pTrackersToolBar );
01976         return pTrackersToolBar;
01977 }
01978 
01984 bool MainWindow::Delete( QModelIndex index )
01985 {
01986 
01987         if( !index.isValid()) return false;
01988         if( index == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
01989         if( index.parent() == sceneModelView->rootIndex() ) return false;
01990 
01991         InstanceNode* instanceNode = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( index );
01992         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
01993 
01994         if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
01995         {
01996                 CmdDeleteTracker* commandDelete = new CmdDeleteTracker( index, m_document->GetSceneKit(), *m_sceneModel );
01997                 m_commandStack->push( commandDelete );
01998         }
01999         else
02000         {
02001                 CmdDelete* commandDelete = new CmdDelete( index, *m_sceneModel );
02002                 m_commandStack->push( commandDelete );
02003         }
02004 
02005 
02006         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02007         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02008 
02009         return true;
02010 }
02011 
02015 QSplitter* MainWindow::GetHorizontalSplitterPointer()
02016 {
02017     QSplitter* pSplitter = findChild< QSplitter* >( "horizontalSplitter" );
02018     if( !pSplitter ) tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::GetSceneModelViewPointer: splitter not found" );
02019     return pSplitter;
02020 }
02021 
02026 bool MainWindow::OkToContinue()
02027 {
02028         if ( m_document->IsModified() )
02029         {
02030                 int answer = QMessageBox::warning( this, tr( "Tonatiuh" ),
02031                                  tr( "The document has been modified.\n"
02032                                      "Do you want to save your changes?"),
02033                                  QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::Default,
02034                                  QMessageBox::No,
02035                                  QMessageBox::Cancel | QMessageBox::Escape );
02036 
02037                 if ( answer == QMessageBox::Yes ) return Save();
02038                 else if ( answer == QMessageBox::Cancel ) return false;
02039         }
02040         return true;
02041 }
02042 
02049 bool MainWindow::Paste( QModelIndex nodeIndex, tgc::PasteType type )
02050 {
02051         if( !nodeIndex.isValid() ) return false;
02052         if( !m_coinNode_Buffer ) return false;
02053 
02054         InstanceNode* ancestor = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( nodeIndex );
02055         SoNode* selectedCoinNode = ancestor->GetNode();
02056 
02057         if ( !selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return false;
02058         if ( ( selectedCoinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) &&
02059         ( m_coinNode_Buffer->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) )       return false;
02060 
02061         if( ancestor->GetNode() == m_coinNode_Buffer)  return false;
02062         while( ancestor->GetParent() )
02063         {
02064                 if(ancestor->GetParent()->GetNode() == m_coinNode_Buffer )      return false;
02065                 ancestor = ancestor->GetParent();
02066         }
02067 
02068         CmdPaste* commandPaste = new CmdPaste( type, m_selectionModel->currentIndex(), m_coinNode_Buffer, *m_sceneModel );
02069         m_commandStack->push( commandPaste );
02070 
02071         m_sceneModel->UpdateSceneModel();
02072         m_document->SetDocumentModified( true );
02073         return true;
02074 
02075 }
02076 
02080 QDir MainWindow::PluginDirectory()
02081 {
02082         // Returns the path to the top level plug-in directory.
02083         // It is assumed that this is a subdirectory named "plugins" of the directory in
02084         // which the running version of Tonatiuh is located.
02085 
02086     QDir directory( qApp->applicationDirPath() );
02087         directory.cd( "plugins" );
02088         return directory;
02089 }
02090 
02094 void MainWindow::ReadSettings()
02095 {
02096     QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
02097     QRect rect = settings.value( "geometry", QRect(200, 200, 400, 400 ) ).toRect();
02098     move( rect.topLeft() );
02099     resize( rect.size() );
02100 
02101     setWindowState( Qt::WindowNoState );
02102     if( settings.value( "windowNoState", false ).toBool() )     setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowNoState );
02103     if( settings.value( "windowMinimized", false ).toBool() )   setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowMinimized );
02104     if( settings.value( "windowMaximized", true ).toBool() )    setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowMaximized );
02105     if( settings.value( "windowFullScreen", false ).toBool() )  setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowFullScreen );
02106     if( settings.value( "windowActive", false ).toBool() )      setWindowState( windowState() ^ Qt::WindowActive );
02107     m_recentFiles = settings.value( "recentFiles" ).toStringList();
02108     UpdateRecentFileActions();
02109 
02110 }
02111 
02115 bool MainWindow::ReadyForRaytracing( InstanceNode*& rootSeparatorInstance, InstanceNode*& lightInstance, SoTransform*& lightTransform, TSunShape*& sunShape, TLightShape*& raycastingShape )
02116 {
02117 
02118         //Check if there is a scene
02119         SoSceneKit* coinScene = m_document->GetSceneKit();
02120         if ( !coinScene )  return false;
02121 
02122         //Check if there is a rootSeparator InstanceNode
02123         rootSeparatorInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
02124         if( !rootSeparatorInstance ) return false;
02125 
02126         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = rootSeparatorInstance->GetParent();
02127         if ( !sceneInstance )  return false;
02128 
02129         //Check if there is a light and is properly configured
02130         if ( !coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) )     return false;
02131         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", true ) );
02132 
02133         lightInstance = sceneInstance->children[0];
02134         if ( !lightInstance ) return false;
02135 
02136         if( !lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) ) return false;
02137         sunShape = static_cast< TSunShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "tsunshape", false ) );
02138 
02139         if( !lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) ) return false;
02140         raycastingShape = static_cast< TLightShape * >( lightKit->getPart( "icon", false ) );
02141 
02142         if( !lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,true ) ) return false;
02143         lightTransform = static_cast< SoTransform * >( lightKit->getPart( "transform" ,true ) );
02144 
02145 
02146         QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomDeviateFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetRandomDeviateFactories();
02147         QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
02148 
02149         //Check if there is a random generator selected;
02150         if( m_selectedRandomDeviate == -1 )
02151         {
02152                 if( randomDeviateFactoryList.size() > 0 ) m_selectedRandomDeviate = 0;
02153                 else    return false;
02154         }
02155 
02156         //Create the random generator
02157         if( !m_rand )   m_rand =  randomDeviateFactoryList[m_selectedRandomDeviate]->CreateRandomDeviate();
02158 
02159         //Check if there is a photon map type selected;
02160         if( m_selectedPhotonMap == -1 )
02161         {
02162                 if( photonmapFactoryList.size() > 0 ) m_selectedPhotonMap = 0;
02163                 else    return false;
02164         }
02165 
02166         //Create the photon map where photons are going to be stored
02167         if( !m_increasePhotonMap )
02168         {
02169                 delete m_photonMap;
02170                 m_photonMap = 0;
02171         }
02172 
02173         if( !m_photonMap )
02174         {
02175                 QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonmapFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetPhotonMapFactories();
02176 
02177                 m_photonMap = photonmapFactoryList[m_selectedPhotonMap]->CreateTPhotonMap();
02178                 m_tracedRays = 0;
02179         }
02180 
02181 
02182         return true;
02183 }
02184 
02190 bool MainWindow::SaveFile( const QString& fileName )
02191 {
02192         if( !m_document->WriteFile( fileName ) )
02193         {
02194                 statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "Saving canceled" ), 2000 );
02195                 return false;
02196         }
02197 
02198         SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02199         statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "File saved" ), 2000 );
02200         return true;
02201 }
02202 
02206 void MainWindow::SetCurrentFile( const QString& fileName )
02207 {
02208         m_currentFile = fileName;
02209         m_document->SetDocumentModified( false );
02210 
02211         QString shownName = "Untitled";
02212         if ( !m_currentFile.isEmpty() )
02213         {
02214                 shownName = StrippedName( m_currentFile );
02215                 m_recentFiles.removeAll( m_currentFile );
02216                 m_recentFiles.prepend( m_currentFile );
02217                 UpdateRecentFileActions();
02218         }
02219 
02220         setWindowTitle( tr( "%1[*] - %2" ).arg( shownName ).arg( tr( "Tonatiuh" ) ) );
02221 }

02235     }

02238 void MainWindow::SetupActionsInsertMaterial()
02239 {
02240         QVector< TMaterialFactory* > materialsFactoryList = m_pluginManager->GetMaterialFactories();
02241         if( !( materialsFactoryList.size() > 0 ) )      return;
02242 
02243         QMenu* pMaterialsMenu = menuInsert->findChild< QMenu* >( "menuMaterial" );
02244         if( !pMaterialsMenu ) return;
02245         if( pMaterialsMenu->isEmpty() )
02246         {
02247                 //Enable material menu
02248                 pMaterialsMenu->setEnabled( true );
02249                 m_materialsToolBar = CreateMaterialsTooBar( pMaterialsMenu );
02250         }
02251 
02252         for( int i = 0; i < materialsFactoryList.size(); ++i )
02253         {
02254                 TMaterialFactory* pTMaterialFactory = materialsFactoryList[i];
02255 
02256                 ActionInsertMaterial* actionInsertMaterial = new ActionInsertMaterial( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialName(), this, pTMaterialFactory );
02257             actionInsertMaterial->setIcon( pTMaterialFactory->TMaterialIcon() );
02258 
02259             pMaterialsMenu->addAction( actionInsertMaterial );
02260                 m_materialsToolBar->addAction( actionInsertMaterial );
02261                 m_materialsToolBar->addSeparator();
02262             connect( actionInsertMaterial, SIGNAL( triggered() ),
02263                          actionInsertMaterial, SLOT( OnActionInsertMaterialTriggered() ) );
02264                 connect( actionInsertMaterial, SIGNAL( CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* ) ),
02265                                                  this, SLOT( CreateMaterial( TMaterialFactory* ) ) );
02266 
02267         }
02268 
02269 }

02454 void MainWindow::SetupGraphicView()
02455 {
02456         //SetupGraphcisRoot();
02457 
02458         QSplitter* pSplitter = findChild<QSplitter *>( "horizontalSplitter" );
02459 
02460         QSplitter* graphicHorizontalSplitter = new QSplitter();
02461         graphicHorizontalSplitter->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8("graphicHorizontalSplitter") );
02462     graphicHorizontalSplitter->setOrientation( Qt::Vertical );
02463     pSplitter->insertWidget( 0, graphicHorizontalSplitter );
02464 
02465         QList<int> sizes;
02466     sizes<<500<<200;
02467     pSplitter->setSizes ( sizes );
02468 
02469 
02470     QSplitter *graphicVerticalSplitter1 = new QSplitter();
02471     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setObjectName( QString::fromUtf8( "graphicVerticalSplitter1" ) );
02472     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setOrientation( Qt::Horizontal );
02473     graphicHorizontalSplitter->insertWidget( 0, graphicVerticalSplitter1 );
02474 
02475     QSplitter *graphicVerticalSplitter2 = new QSplitter();
02476     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicVerticalSplitter2"));
02477     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal);
02478     graphicHorizontalSplitter->insertWidget( 1, graphicVerticalSplitter2 );
02479 
02480     QList<int> height;
02481     height<<200<<200;
02482     graphicHorizontalSplitter->setSizes ( height );
02483 
02484     GraphicView* graphicView1 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter1);
02485     graphicView1->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView1"));
02486     m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView1);
02487     GraphicView* graphicView2 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter1);
02488     graphicView2->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView2"));
02489         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView2);
02490     GraphicView* graphicView3 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter2);
02491     graphicView3->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView3"));
02492         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView3);
02493     GraphicView* graphicView4 = new GraphicView(graphicVerticalSplitter2);
02494     graphicView4->setObjectName(QString::fromUtf8("graphicView4"));
02495         m_graphicView.push_back(graphicView4);
02496 
02497     graphicVerticalSplitter1->addWidget(m_graphicView[0]);
02498     graphicVerticalSplitter1->addWidget(m_graphicView[1]);
02499     graphicVerticalSplitter2->addWidget(m_graphicView[2]);
02500     graphicVerticalSplitter2->addWidget(m_graphicView[3]);
02501 
02502     QList<int> widthSizes;
02503     widthSizes<<100<<100;
02504     graphicVerticalSplitter1->setSizes ( widthSizes );
02505     graphicVerticalSplitter2->setSizes ( widthSizes );
02506 
02507     if( graphicVerticalSplitter1 && graphicVerticalSplitter2 )
02508         {
02509                 m_graphicView[0] = graphicVerticalSplitter1->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView1" );
02510         if ( m_graphicView[0] != NULL )
02511         {
02512             m_graphicView[0]->resize( 600, 400 );
02513             m_graphicView[0]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02514             m_graphicView[0]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02515             m_graphicView[0]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02516         }
02517                 else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[0] not found" );
02518 
02519                 if ( m_graphicView[1] != NULL )
02520         {
02521             m_graphicView[1]->resize( 600, 400 );
02522             m_graphicView[1]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02523             m_graphicView[1]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02524             m_graphicView[1]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02525             m_focusView=1;
02526             on_action_X_Y_Plane_triggered();
02527         }
02528         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[1] not found" );
02529 
02530                 m_graphicView[2] = graphicVerticalSplitter2->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView3" );
02531         if ( m_graphicView[2] != NULL )
02532         {
02533             m_graphicView[2]->resize( 600, 400 );
02534             m_graphicView[2]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02535             m_graphicView[2]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02536             m_graphicView[2]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02537             m_focusView=2;
02538             on_action_Y_Z_Plane_triggered();
02539         }
02540         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[2] not found" );
02541 
02542         m_graphicView[3] = graphicVerticalSplitter2->findChild< GraphicView* >( "graphicView4" );
02543         if ( m_graphicView[3] !=  NULL )
02544         {
02545             m_graphicView[3]->resize( 600, 400 );
02546             m_graphicView[3]->SetSceneGraph( m_graphicsRoot );
02547             m_graphicView[3]->setModel( m_sceneModel );
02548             m_graphicView[3]->setSelectionModel( m_selectionModel );
02549             m_focusView=3;
02550             on_action_X_Z_Plane_triggered();
02551         }
02552             else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: graphicView[3] not found" );
02553     }
02554         else tgf::SevereError( "MainWindow::InitializeGraphicView: verticalSplitter not found" );
02555 
02556         m_graphicView[1]->hide();
02557         m_graphicView[2]->hide();
02558         m_graphicView[3]->hide();
02559         m_focusView = 0;
02560 }

02699 void MainWindow::ShowRaysIn3DView()
02700 {
02701         actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( false );
02702         actionDisplayRays->setChecked( false );
02703 
02704 
02705         if( m_fraction > 0.0 || m_drawPhotons )
02706         {
02707                 SoSeparator* rays = new SoSeparator;
02708                 rays->ref();
02709                 rays->setName( "Rays" );
02710 
02711                 if( m_drawPhotons )
02712                 {
02713                         SoSeparator* points = trf::DrawPhotonMapPoints(*m_photonMap);
02714                         rays->addChild(points);
02715                 }
02716                 if( m_fraction > 0.0 )
02717                 {
02718                         SoSeparator* currentRays = trf::DrawPhotonMapRays(*m_photonMap, m_tracedRays, m_fraction );
02719                         if( currentRays )       rays->addChild(currentRays);
02720 
02721                 }
02722                 m_graphicsRoot->AddRays( rays );
02723 
02724                 actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( true );
02725                 actionDisplayRays->setChecked( true );
02726         }
02727 }

02733 bool MainWindow::StartOver( const QString& fileName )
02734 {
02735         InstanceNode* sceneInstance = m_sceneModel->NodeFromIndex( sceneModelView->rootIndex() );
02736         InstanceNode* concentratorRoot = sceneInstance->children[ sceneInstance->children.size() -1 ];
02737         m_selectionModel->setCurrentIndex( m_sceneModel->IndexFromNodeUrl( concentratorRoot->GetNodeURL() ), QItemSelectionModel::ClearAndSelect );
02738 
02739         actionDisplayRays->setEnabled( false );
02740         actionDisplayRays->setChecked( false );
02741 
02742         m_graphicsRoot->RemoveRays();
02743         m_graphicsRoot->RemoveModel();
02744 
02745         m_commandStack->clear();
02746         m_sceneModel->Clear();
02747 
02748         SetSunPositionCalculatorEnabled( 0 );
02749 
02750         QStatusBar* statusbar = new QStatusBar;
02751         setStatusBar( statusbar );
02752 
02753         if( !fileName.isEmpty() && m_document->ReadFile( fileName ) )
02754         {
02755                 statusbar->showMessage( tr( "File loaded" ), 2000 );
02756             SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02757         }
02758         else
02759         {
02760                 m_document->New();
02761             statusbar->showMessage( tr( "New file" ), 2000 );
02762 
02763             SetCurrentFile( "" );
02764         }
02765 
02766     ChangeModelScene();
02767 
02768 
02769    /*if( fileName.isEmpty() )
02770     {
02771         m_document->New();
02772         statusbar->showMessage( tr( "New file" ), 2000 );
02773     }
02774     else
02775     {
02776         if( !m_document->ReadFile( fileName ) )
02777                 {
02778                         statusBar()->showMessage( tr( "Loading canceled" ), 2000 );
02779                         return false;
02780                 }
02781        statusbar->showMessage( tr( "File loaded" ), 2000 );
02782     }
02783 
02784     SetCurrentFile( fileName );
02785 
02786     ChangeModelScene();*/
02787 
02788     return true;
02789 }

02794 QString MainWindow::StrippedName( const QString& fullFileName )
02795 {
02796         return QFileInfo( fullFileName ).fileName();
02797 }
02798 
02802 void MainWindow::UpdateRecentFileActions()
02803 {
02804         QMutableStringListIterator iterator( m_recentFiles );
02805         while ( iterator.hasNext() )
02806         {
02807                 if ( !QFile::exists( iterator.next() ) ) iterator.remove();
02808         }
02809 
02810         for ( int j = 0; j < m_maxRecentFiles; ++j )
02811         {
02812                 if ( j < m_recentFiles.count() )
02813                 {
02814                         QString text = tr( "&%1 %2" )
02815                                        .arg( j + 1 )
02816                                        .arg( StrippedName( m_recentFiles[j] ) );
02817                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setText( text );
02818                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setData( m_recentFiles[j] );
02819                         m_recentFileActions[j]->setVisible( true );
02820                 }
02821                 else m_recentFileActions[j]->setVisible( false );
02822         }
02823 }
02824 
02828 void MainWindow::WriteSettings()
02829 {
02830         QSettings settings( "NREL UTB CENER", "Tonatiuh" );
02831         settings.setValue( "geometry", geometry() );
02832 
02833         Qt::WindowStates states = windowState();
02834         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowNoState ) )      settings.setValue( "windowNoState", true );
02835         else    settings.setValue( "windowNoState", false );
02836         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowMinimized ) )    settings.setValue( "windowMinimized", true );
02837         else    settings.setValue( "windowMinimized", false );
02838         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowMaximized ) )    settings.setValue( "windowMaximized", true );
02839         else    settings.setValue( "windowMaximized", false );
02840         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowFullScreen ) )   settings.setValue( "windowFullScreen", true );
02841         else    settings.setValue( "windowFullScreen", false );
02842         if( states.testFlag( Qt::WindowActive ) )       settings.setValue( "windowActive", true );
02843         else    settings.setValue( "windowActive", false );
02844 
02845     settings.setValue( "recentFiles", m_recentFiles );
02846 }
